tool_description: Monitor the Web for interesting new content
name: Web Monitoring Service
title: Web Monitoring Service

api_list.name: Subscribe (ULTRA plan)
api_list.description: We adopt push technology to send result instantly to your url endpoint for your further process when our monitoring system detected specific keyword content publishing on the web , you will receive notification with list of details via email. Feel free to email us at **admin@core-api.net** if you have any question.

optional_parameters.name: endpoint_url
optional_parameters.description: Url that you want system to send to when result is available.
